movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: The Lion King is a visually stunning live-action/CGI remake of the beloved animated classic. Follow the journey of Simba, a young lion prince, as he discovers his identity and fulfills his destiny as the king of the Pride Lands.

movies.title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
movies.description: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle is a darker and more realistic adaptation of Rudyard Kipling's classic stories. Join Mowgli, a human raised by wolves, as he navigates the dangers of the jungle and discovers his place in the animal kingdom.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: Doctor Strange follows the journey of Dr. Stephen Strange, a brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon, who seeks mystical healing after a car accident. Enter the world of sorcery and dimensions as he transforms into the Sorcerer Supreme.

movies.title: John Wick
movies.description: John Wick is a relentless action film that follows the titular character, a retired hitman seeking vengeance for the death of his beloved dog. Brace yourself for intense gunfights and stylish action sequences.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.description: The Notebook is a heartwarming romantic drama that spans decades. Witness the enduring love story of Noah and Allie as they navigate the challenges of social class, family expectations, and the passage of time.
